name: Fast Bus Furious Driver
description:
Fast Bus Furious Driver

Do you like bus games?
If your answer is 'yes', Bus Simulator is a new simulation game for all who want to become a real bus driver.
you can enjoy the exciting ride of bus hill climb or uphill racing game.
There are amazing 3d levels which u ll enjoy while playing.
There are many bus routes to complete across the city. Take the passengers from the bus stops and drive them to their
destinations in the other part of the big city.

user must have to park the car in some duration.so be careful,accurate and speedy to park a bus.
This game includes a 3D Models of different types of bus,hill and valley locations.
If you're a fan of the racing games, bus driving might feel a bit slow for you. It's the best bus simulator for all who like taxi
games, bus parking and other passenger games. Only this time you drive the city bus which is a big vehicle. Try out Bus
Simulator - one of the best bus games of 2016 and become the best bus driver!

key features:

- full 3D big city environment
- Adventurous levels
- multiple camera views
- Cool Sounds
- More levels Coming Soon
